description: T.1 Yew - Crown lift to 3m from ground level and lightly shape laterals.T.2 Oak - Reduce the side laterals overhanging the drive by 1.5-2m to suitable growth points and shape into remaining crown sympatheticaly.T.3 Holm Oak - Reduce the height by approx 4m to match height of adjacent Yew. G.1 Leyland Cypress screen - (exempt).
